results.content: Thank you for this course. I could learn a lot how to build a WordPress theme from scratch. Will you do an update of this course as well?
results.content_html: Thank you for this course. I could learn a lot how to build a WordPress theme from scratch. Will you do an update of this course as well?

results.content: I've been following up this course and for a paid course this one doesn't have enough value. Specially the section where converting the static HTML to WordPress theme lacks proper explanations and guidance. Instructor doing stuff without explaining it properly. Me being a WordPress user and amature WordPress developer for some time finding it hard to follow up means most of the beginner levell users will not be able to pick up.

results.content: I was WP theme developer way back 2010. Good thing I found your courses for WP, it really refreshes and brushed up my WP knowledge!
results.content_html: I was WP theme developer way back 2010. Good thing I found your courses for WP, it really refreshes and brushed up my WP knowledge!

results.content: The teacher creates a new page template for every page, and then puts static content into the template, instead of letting the template pull content from the database. It's like a hacked version of a WP site, instead of using WP as it was intended. And you don't find this out till the very end of the course. Sigh...
results.content_html: The teacher creates a new page template for every page, and then puts static content into the template, instead of letting the template pull content from the database. It's like a hacked version of a WP site, instead of using WP as it was intended. And you don't find this out till the very end of the course. Sigh...

results.content: I decided to look past the low quality sound and video. However, the content was also low quality. When it said "from scratch" I thought it meant that I would be writing the code for the theme. That is not true, it just started with a premade blank theme and copied HTML and CSS around that. It is not a theme from scratch, but rather a theme from a basic theme. Now I know that it does not cover what it promised, and it is also low quality production, I give a single start. I wish I had money back.

and
